node.name: Q7 Professional
node.shortdescription:
UI test automation solution which works solely with Eclipse-based apps. Our focused approach allows full Eclipse integration and provides productivity boost for QA engineers. Here are some of our key features:

  • Handcrafted for Eclipse – out-of-the-box support for Eclipse technologies such as SWT/JFace, GEF and GMF
  • State management – create reusable models describing state of workspace, workbench, preferences and other aspects of application-under-test
  • Productivity – capture/replay functionality with no dependencies on UI element size and location
  • Intentions preserving – easy to read DSL language and test-associated metadata such as tags and description allow anyone in the team understand the purpose of the test and performed actions
node.body:
UI test automation solution which works solely with Eclipse-based apps. Our focused approach allows full Eclipse integration and provides productivity boost for QA engineers. Here are some of our key features:

  • Handcrafted for Eclipse – out-of-the-box support for Eclipse technologies such as SWT/JFace, GEF and GMF
  • State management – create reusable models describing state of workspace, workbench, preferences and other aspects of application-under-test
  • Productivity – capture/replay functionality with no dependencies on UI element size and location
  • Intentions preserving – easy to read DSL language and test-associated metadata such as tags and description allow anyone in the team understand the purpose of the test and performed actions
